scripts.setup: CREATE=true node app.js && sequelize db:seed:all --config src/config/config.json --seeders-path src/seeders && sequelize db:migrate --config src/config/config.json --migrations-path src/migrations
scripts.update: CREATE=true node app.js && sequelize db:migrate --config src/config/config.json --migrations-path src/migrations
scripts.delete: FORCE=true node app.js && sequelize db:seed:all --config src/config/config.json --seeders-path src/seeders && sequelize db:migrate --config src/config/config.json --migrations-path src/migrations
scripts.pretest: FORCE=true NODE_ENV=test node app.js && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all --config src/config/config.json --seeders-path src/seeders && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate --config src/config/config.json --migrations-path src/migrations
